gui.playfield
Class PlayField

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class PlayField
extends javax.swing.JPanel

The canvas where node graphics and message visualizations are drawn.

Parameters:

Parameters:

setAutoClearOverlay

public void setAutoClearOverlay(boolean clear)
Enables or disables the automatic clearing of overlay graphics. If enabled, overlay graphics are cleared every time a new graphics object is set to be drawn.

Parameters:
clear - Auto clear is enabled if this is true, disabled on false

setFocusOnClick

public void setFocusOnClick(boolean focus)
Enables or disables the automatic clearing of overlay graphics. If enabled, overlay graphics are cleared every time a new graphics object is set to be drawn.

Parameters:
clear - Auto clear is enabled if this is true, disabled on false

g - The graphics context to draw the field to

getWorldPosition

public Coord getWorldPosition(Coord loc)
Returns a world location for a given graphical location. Note that there might be inaccuracies because of rounding.

Parameters:
loc - The location to convert
Returns:
Same location in world space
